mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_Community (communityId, communityName, communityDate, user_id, communityDesc) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(communityId) + 1 FROM TB_Community), #{communityname}, SYSDATE, #{user_id}, #{communitydesc})
insert into TB_COMMUNITY_MEMBER (USER_ID, communityId, MEMBER_DATE, MEMBER_ROLL) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{communityid}, SYSDATE, #{member_roll})
insert into tb_community_req (reqno, user_id, communityid, requestdes, requestdate) values (req_seq.nextval, #{user_id},#{communityid},#{requestdes},sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from tb_community_member where user_id = #{user_id} and communityid = #{communityid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_COMMUNITY where COMMUNITYNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select communityid, communityname, communitydate, user_id, communityimgori, communityimgrename, communitydesc, ROWNUM from TB_COMMUNITY where COMMUNITYNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
WHERE ROWNUM >= #{ paging.startRow } and ROWNUM <= #{ paging.endRow }
